questions.question: A procedure to alter level in a holding pattern is known as:
Unless otherwise published or informed by ATC, after entering a holding pattern all turns are made:
options: b. to the left then right.
d. procedure turn right then left.

questions.question: In a holding pattern turns are to be made at a:
options: b. rate of turn = 3°/sec or 20° bank angle whichever is less.
c. rate of turn = 3°/sec or 25° bank angle whichever is less.
